root.name: Power Factory Featuring C+C Music Factory
root.description: OverviewThe third in Sony Imagesoft's "Make My Video" franchise; in this game, players make music videos for C+C Music Factory. Players may choose from their hit songs, including 'Gonna Make You Sweat' and 'Things That Make You Go HMMM'.Beside re-arranging the video frames, players can also select from 16 types of video effects. When complete, judges will score the resultant video.Critical ReceptionElectronic Gaming Monthly issued the scores of 3,5,5,6 adding, "...You watch a bunch of footage while the song plays. Then you hear the song again and see the video... it's getting old. The same film footage for the videos is always being reused and the video effects seem weak..."

similar_games.game: Make My Video: Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch
